products.title: Origin, Black - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Shop their range of zebra roller blinds with fast delivery & free samples. The best blinds at the best prices guaranteed, 98% of customers agree.
products.productdescription: In sleek ebony, the origin in black is flawlessly chic. The blind comprises of a smooth, contemporary double layering of jet black fabric, which hosts a sliding strip of black striped netting, and an overhead rail cassette containing the controls and brackets.Fuse the black with a sunny yellow for a cool and fashionable look in a teenager's bedroom. Stick to a base of pure white walls, and use a mixture of black and lemon for the bedlinen, wall hangings, and ornaments. Don't be afraid to add a bold pattern or two, in matching tones, to the mix!

products.title: Luna Softshade Jet Black Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Luna softshade jet black day and night blind in black. Made to measure from 28.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Make an update that will benefit the look and feel of your interior with this practical day and night roller blind. The luna softshade jet black day and night roller blind is designed with flexibility in mind. It can be fully opened or closed just like a standard day and night roller blind as well as adjusted to a semi closed position that enables both natural light penetration and privacy.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1862 fabric colour: jet black material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Origin, Black - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, black - vista blind a modern take on the classic roller blind, origin black allows you to add colour and light control to your home in a truly new way that will bring your decor to life. Lightweight and finely woven, every square inch of this prem
products.productdescription: A modern take on the classic roller blind, origin black allows you to add colour and light control to your home in a truly new way that will bring your decor to life. Lightweight and finely woven, every square inch of this premium fabric is accompanied by a subtly patterned voile. As the sun makes its way across the sky you can make the fine adjustments that allow you to keep the perfect balance of light and shade.For a striking modern room layout contrast the pitch black of origin black with crisp and clean whites and a selection of minimalist furniture. The unique design of the vista blind will give you the perfect touch of hidden functionality that every minimalist home should have.

products.title: Nightshade, Black - Day Night Blind
products.metadescription: Nightshade, black - day night blind in stunning ebony, the nightshade in black is flawless in its appearance, offering just a hint of sheen on its pure black backdrop. Double layered fabric, thickly stitched to ensure extra light protection, hosts a trans
products.productdescription: In stunning ebony, the nightshade in black is flawless in its appearance, offering just a hint of sheen on its pure black backdrop. Double layered fabric, thickly stitched to ensure extra light protection, hosts a translucent netting that can be adjusted to provide more or less light and privacy.Once you choose the black, you're choosing to make a statement, so why be shy with the colours? Use it in the dining room amidst pillar-box reds and pure whites for a committed contemporary scheme. Ensure that your furniture fits in by going for clean, modern lines in blacks and whites.
